enum.name: selection_method
enum.comment: Originally was terrain_mesh_obb, but I was having issues attacking it with a company (took two clicks), tried setting it to this and it seemed to work much better.

template_reference.name: exts
template_reference.comment: Exists as a stop gap until action_apply is working correctly. Causes buildings to take 2x damage while under construction.
